txt.en: Assisted Fraid with Thieves at the Galtrev Lumber-camp
Assisted Fraid with Stolen Stacks of Lumber
A shipment of wood from the lumber-camp was meant to arrive at Galtrev quite a while ago, but was stalled somewhere along the the road.

'Pardon, Duvodiad, but may I speak with you for a second? Please, this must be quiet. I need your help.\n\n'The daily wood shipment from the Galtrev Lumber-camp is late, and I fear for the...well-being of the driver, Fraid, upon his return. I heard the Overseer of Isengard whispering that he would be sorely punished for this delay.'

The driver of the wood-waggon has become lost somewhere between Galtrev and the nearby Galtrev Lumber-camp to the north.\n\nYou should search for the missing driver and help the missing shipment reach Galtrev.
'Thank you, [placeholder]. You were most kind to come and help me, but should not Isengard protect us? That was their promise....'

Fraid lies injured by his broken waggon in Pren Gwydh, near the Galtrev Lumber-camp.\n\nYou should speak with Fraid again, now that you have helped to allay the threat of the Dragon-clan at the Galtrev Lumber-camp.
'I do not know what is keeping Fraid, but more fearful than what may have happened to him beyond the gates is that which awaits him here.'
Assist Fraid with Thieves at the Galtrev Lumber-camp
Assist Fraid with Stolen Stacks of Lumber
Talk to Fraid at his waggon
